mapper.sql: SYSTEM_NAME, NAME, YEAR, DECEMBER, JANUARY, FEBRUARY, MARCH, APRIL, MAY, JUNE, JULY, AUGUST, SEPTEMBER, OCTOBER, NOVEMBER, TOTAL_COST, SERVER_START_TIME, SERVER_END_TIME
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from REQ_COST_RECORD
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into REQ_COST_RECORD (SYSTEM_NAME, NAME, YEAR, DECEMBER, JANUARY, FEBRUARY, MARCH, APRIL, MAY, JUNE, JULY, AUGUST, SEPTEMBER, OCTOBER, NOVEMBER, TOTAL_COST, SERVER_START_TIME, SERVER_END_TIME ) values (#{systemName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{year,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{december,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{january,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{february,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{march,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{april,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{may,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{june,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{july,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{august,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{september,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{october,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{november,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{totalCost,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{serverStartTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{serverEndTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
